name: CUBE - Testing area one
description:
Physics based puzzle game, where you need to solve puzzles usign boxes and your antygrav gun. Remember not to overheat your gun or it will shut down for few seconds.

THIS IS REALLY EARLY VERSION, it's also my first full 3D game in Unity.
WSAD - movement.
F- Picking up, and putting boxes down.
Lmb /rmb - manipulating cubes distance from player.
Lmb and rmb clicked at the same time - throw cube.

Try to not throw cubes out of boundaries cause this will resoult in failing game.
This version of the game doesn't have any objectives right now, so feel free to call yourself "winner" when you stand in highest place avalible in game. (platform above room with many boxes). 

That's all, Hope you like it!
